Armani

About Me

My name's Armani and I'm a Chicago Native making his way through Front End Development with the help of Free Code Camp. Coding has managed to pop up in my life repeatedly and I decided to just take the hint and give it a try. I love learning just for the sake of knowledge and hopefully this will be the place I can show off the things I learn!

I've spent most of my years writing everything from stories to articles. I'm currently working on my first novel. You can check out my blogging on Medium.

Coding has been an interest of mine for a while and it's something I hope contine to learn. While I'm starting with front end development, I hope to eventually learn programming.

An amateur photographer taking the time to increase my skills. I shoot with a Canon Rebel T-3 and have a lot of Photoshop experience.
